sourcesContent:
import '../styles/components/Scorecard.css'; const Scorecard = ({ title, data, isBowling = false }) => { return (

{title}

{isBowling ? ( <> ) : ( <> )} {data.map((player, index) => ( {isBowling ? ( <> ) : ( <> )} ))}
Player Overs Runs Wickets Economy Maidens Wides No BallsPlayer Runs Balls Strike Rate Fours Sixes Status
{player.name} {player.overs} {player.runs_conceded} {player.wickets} {player.economy} {player.maidens} {player.wides} {player.no_balls}{player.name} {player.runs} {player.balls_faced} {player.strike_rate} {player.fours} {player.sixes} {player.dismissal || 'Not Out'}
); }; export default Scorecard;
